name: Tiny Ninja Fighter - Play 8-bit Pixel Retro Fighting Games for Free
name_original: Tiny Ninja Fighter - Play 8-bit Pixel Retro Fighting Games for Free
description:
Tiny Ninja wants to destroy some brick walls because he is mad... This indie super addictive game is awesome. Try to break as many brick walls as possible without colliding into them. Get your best score and share it on Twitter and Facebook with friends. Compete with other players in Game Center.

Game Features:

* 8-bit art style and retro look
* Play with just one tap
* Very fast and challenging game play
* Easy to play, but hard to master
* Game Center integrated for more fun
* FREE... everything is there at no price

This cute indie game is absolutely awesome!
